name: Dark Era
description:
The game story realized on ancient Brazilian village captured by mythological creatures.

  • A local hero called Romulus comes to save the villagers and killed the creatures.
  • Dark Era is an online multiplayer game.
  • 5 players can play the game at once.
  • Main characters
  • Two modes – Hero / Enemy (randomly chosen by the games).

    -Urban Hero (Romulus)

    -Boss Enemy (Boitata)

    -Enemy (Caipora)
